session.objective: Execute Phase 5 of Forgetful migration (MED confidence preferences) and run comprehensive validation tests

workLog.action: Ran dry-run for MED confidence learnings
workLog.result: Identified 114 MED confidence learnings across 21 domains from 35 observation files

workLog.action: Created 5 new Forgetful projects for uncovered domains
workLog.result: Projects created: ai-agents-reflect (22), ai-agents-retrospective (23), ai-agents-quality-gates (24), ai-agents-cost-optimization (25), ai-agents-skillforge (26)

workLog.action: Executed MED confidence import to Forgetful

workLog.result: 9 diverse queries all returned highly relevant results with good domain coverage
All sampled memories have correct provenance fields, importance scores (7-8), and confidence values (0.85)
Auto-linking correctly identifies similar memories with average 6.3 links per memory
No exact duplicates found, 2 near-duplicates appropriately linked together
25 of 26 projects have memories, only ai-agents-session-protocol empty
Complete migration statistics: 456 memories across 26 projects

deliverables.description: Dry-run results showing 114 MED confidence learnings
Final migration summary with cumulative statistics

decisions.decision: Created 5 new projects for domains without existing projects
decisions.rationale: ai-agents-reflect, ai-agents-retrospective, ai-agents-quality-gates, ai-agents-cost-optimization, ai-agents-skillforge needed for proper domain organization
decisions.impact: Enables domain-specific memory retrieval for reflect, retrospective, quality-gates, cost-optimization, and skillforge domains

decisions.rationale: Similar memories from different phases provide reinforcement from different sessions
decisions.impact: Memories 275/397 and 276/398 are linked together rather than deduplicated

patterns.pattern: Auto-linking identifies semantically similar memories across domains
patterns.application: Memory 416 linked to foundation memories (8, 38) demonstrating cross-domain relevance

patterns.pattern: Provenance tracking enables full audit trail
patterns.context: All imported memories have source_repo, source_files, encoding_agent fields
patterns.application: Use provenance fields to trace memory origins and update confidence

nextSteps: Consider Phase 6 for LOW confidence notes if needed
Monitor observation files for changes requiring re-sync
Use semantic search for cross-domain knowledge retrieval
